network_overview: The capture contains only IMS signalling for two VoLTE/VoNR calls that were both cancelled after ~16 s; every flow ended with SIP 487 "Request Terminated" and no bearer-plane (RTP) traffic is present, so no actual voice minutes were delivered.

observations.finding: 100 % of SIP INVITEs were answered with 407 Proxy Authentication Required, followed by successful re-INVITE, 183/180 ringing, and finally CANCEL after 16 s; no 200 OK for call completion seen.
Zero RTP packets captured; media bearer was never established, so voice quality metrics (MOS, packet-loss, jitter) are undefined.

root_causes.description: Both call legs progressed normally through IMS authentication (407→re-INVITE), early media (183) and ringing (180), but the originating UE sent CANCEL with cause 16 (normal call clearing) after ~16 s. This matches user-initiated hang-up rather than a network failure.
root_causes.impact: Post-dial delay perception; no revenue-generating call minutes.

recommendations.action: Analyse why subscribers abandon calls after ~16 s of ringing; correlate with radio coverage, paging success and S-CSCF Alert-Timer (default 15-20 s) to confirm network ringing duration aligns with user expectations.
recommendations.rationale: Reduces perceived post-dial delay and increases answer-seizure ratio (ASR).

recommendations.action: Enable SIP OPTIONS keep-alive or reduce UDP T1 retransmission timer on P-CSCF to avoid the 68-364 pkt/s bursts seen in short flows.
recommendations.rationale: Lowens signalling load and risk of NAT/firewall state loss.

recommendations.action: Capture concurrent GTP-U bearer trace for same IMS Call-IDs to verify that dedicated bearer (QCI=1) setup succeeded and RTP was offered correctly.
recommendations.rationale: Ensures media plane readiness so future calls can complete.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Control-plane completed authentication, early media and ringing; no SIP 5xx or retransmission anomalies detected.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U/RTP packets observed; dedicated bearer establishment cannot be confirmed from this trace.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No RTP stream ⇒ no MOS, jitter or packet-loss data; call never reached active speech phase.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Signalling reached 180 Ringing but absence of bearer trace means media readiness is unverified; user abandonment occurred before 200 OK.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant P-CSCF
    participant S-CSCF
    UE->>P-CSCF: INVITE
    P-CSCF->>S-CSCF: INVITE
    S-CSCF->>P-CSCF: 407 Proxy Auth Required
    P-CSCF->>UE: 407 Proxy Auth Required
    UE->>P-CSCF: ACK
    UE->>P-CSCF: INVITE (with credentials)
    P-CSCF->>S-CSCF: INVITE
    S-CSCF->>P-CSCF: 183 Session Progress
    P-CSCF->>UE: 183 Session Progress
    UE->>P-CSCF: PRACK
    S-CSCF->>P-CSCF: 180 Ringing
    P-CSCF->>UE: 180 Ringing
    Note over UE,S-CSCF: ~16 s ringing
    UE->>P-CSCF: CANCEL (cause=16)
    P-CSCF->>S-CSCF: CANCEL
    S-CSCF->>P-CSCF: 487 Request Terminated
    P-CSCF->>UE: 487 Request Terminated
    UE->>P-CSCF: ACK
